name: History
text: Founded in 2021, that was a time where the third wave of COVID-19 was hitting Canada hard. Due to the fluctuating restrictions, we saw an opportunity to join people together in those troublesome times by the common love of tea. Today, even though the pandemic is mostly behind us, our community moved forward with the times. We are hosting new activities every few weeks and hopefully when people come in they can feel welcomed and talk about anything over a cup of tea!

name: Values
text: UofTea Party is a club for socializing over the common love of tea. It doesnâ€™t matter that if you like tea or not, as long as you like people who drink it, anyone can join in and have fun. We prioritize prioritizing the tea culture where people from all over the world can just sit down, enjoy the beverage, and have a great time with others.

name: Vision
text: Currently, we are planning on providing consistent community events whether online or in person. In the future, we are planning on hosting a massive Bridegington-style tea party where thousands of ideas could be exchanged and everyone can have a great time.
